problems.title: Combinations
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given two integers n and k, return all possible combinations of k numbers chosen from the range [1, n].

The combinations should be printed in lexicographical order.

Backtracking Approach:
At each step, choose a number i from [start, n].
Recurse with start = i + 1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
4 2

Sample Output
1,2 1,3 1,4 2,3 2,4 3,4

Explanation:
Combinations of 2 numbers from [1, 2, 3, 4].
hintsList: Use a helper function with parameters (start_num, current_combination).
Iterate from start_num to n. Add number, recurse, remove number (backtrack).
